member.name: T:RestSharp.Authenticators.HttpBasicAuthenticator
member.summary: Allows "basic access authentication" for HTTP requests.
member.remarks: Encoding can be specified depending on what your server expect (see https://stackoverflow.com/a/7243567). UTF-8 is used by default but some servers might expect ISO-8859-1 encoding.

member.name: T:RestSharp.Authenticators.JwtAuthenticator
member.summary: JSON WEB TOKEN (JWT) Authenticator class. https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-ietf-oauth-json-web-token

member.name: M:RestSharp.Authenticators.JwtAuthenticator.SetBearerToken(System.String)
member.summary: Set the new bearer token so the request gets the new header value

member.name: F:RestSharp.Authenticators.OAuth.OAuthTools.UriRfc3986CharsToEscape
member.summary: The set of characters that are unreserved in RFC 2396 but are NOT unreserved in RFC 3986.

member.name: M:RestSharp.Authenticators.OAuth.OAuthTools.GetNonce
member.summary: Generates a random 16-byte lowercase alphanumeric string.

member.name: M:RestSharp.Authenticators.OAuth.OAuthTools.GetTimestamp
member.summary: Generates a timestamp based on the current elapsed seconds since '01/01/1970 0000 GMT"

member.name: M:RestSharp.Authenticators.OAuth.OAuthTools.GetTimestamp(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Generates a timestamp based on the elapsed seconds of a given time since '01/01/1970 0000 GMT"

member.name: M:RestSharp.Authenticators.OAuth.OAuthTools.UrlEncodeRelaxed(System.String)
member.summary: URL encodes a string based on section 5.1 of the OAuth spec. Namely, percent encoding with [RFC3986], avoiding unreserved characters, upper-casing hexadecimal characters, and UTF-8 encoding for text value pairs.
member.remarks: The method is supposed to take on RFC 3986 behavior if certain elements are present in a .config file. Even if this actually worked (which in my experiments it doesn't), we can't rely on every host actually having this configuration element present.

member.name: M:RestSharp.Authenticators.OAuth.OAuthTools.UrlEncodeStrict(System.String)
member.summary: URL encodes a string based on section 5.1 of the OAuth spec. Namely, percent encoding with [RFC3986], avoiding unreserved characters, upper-casing hexadecimal characters, and UTF-8 encoding for text value pairs.

member.name: M:RestSharp.Authenticators.OAuth.OAuthTools.NormalizeRequestParameters(RestSharp.Authenticators.OAuth.WebPairCollection)
member.summary: Sorts a collection of key-value pairs by name, and then value if equal, concatenating them into a single string. This string should be encoded prior to, or after normalization is run.

member.name: M:RestSharp.Authenticators.OAuth.OAuthTools.SortParametersExcludingSignature(RestSharp.Authenticators.OAuth.WebPairCollection)
member.summary: Sorts a by name, and then value if equal.
member.param: A collection of parameters to sort

member.name: M:RestSharp.Authenticators.OAuth.OAuthTools.ConstructRequestUrl(System.Uri)
member.summary: Creates a request URL suitable for making OAuth requests. Resulting URLs must exclude port 80 or port 443 when accompanied by HTTP and HTTPS, respectively. Resulting URLs must be lower case.

member.name: M:RestSharp.Authenticators.OAuth.OAuthTools.ConcatenateRequestElements(System.String,System.String,RestSharp.Authenticators.OAuth.WebPairCollection)
member.summary: Creates a request elements concatenation value to send with a request. This is also known as the signature base.

member.name: M:RestSharp.Authenticators.OAuth.OAuthTools.GetSignature(RestSharp.Authenticators.OAuth.OAuthSignatureMethod,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a signature value given a signature base and the consumer secret. This method is used when the token secret is currently unknown.

member.name: M:RestSharp.Authenticators.OAuth.OAuthTools.GetSignature(RestSharp.Authenticators.OAuth.OAuthSignatureMethod,RestSharp.Authenticators.OAuth.OAuthSignatureTreatment,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a signature value given a signature base and the consumer secret. This method is used when the token secret is currently unknown.
member.param: The treatment to use on a signature value

member.name: M:RestSharp.Authenticators.OAuth.OAuthTools.GetSignature(RestSharp.Authenticators.OAuth.OAuthSignatureMethod,RestSharp.Authenticators.OAuth.OAuthSignatureTreatment,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a signature value given a signature base and the consumer secret and a known token secret.
member.param: The treatment to use on a signature value

member.name: T:RestSharp.Authenticators.OAuth.OAuthWorkflow
member.summary: A class to encapsulate OAuth authentication flow.

member.name: M:RestSharp.Authenticators.OAuth.OAuthWorkflow.BuildRequestTokenInfo(System.String,RestSharp.Authenticators.OAuth.WebPairCollection)
member.summary: Generates an OAuth signature to pass to an for the purpose of requesting an unauthorized request token.
member.param: The HTTP method for the intended request
Any existing, non-OAuth query parameters desired in the request

member.name: M:RestSharp.Authenticators.OAuth.OAuthWorkflow.BuildAccessTokenSignature(System.String,RestSharp.Authenticators.OAuth.WebPairCollection)
member.summary: Generates an OAuth signature to pass to the for the purpose of exchanging a request token for an access token authorized by the user at the Service Provider site.
member.param: The HTTP method for the intended request
Any existing, non-OAuth query parameters desired in the request

member.name: M:RestSharp.Authenticators.OAuth.OAuthWorkflow.BuildClientAuthAccessTokenSignature(System.String,RestSharp.Authenticators.OAuth.WebPairCollection)
member.summary: Generates an OAuth signature to pass to an for the purpose of exchanging user credentials for an access token authorized by the user at the Service Provider site.
member.param: The HTTP method for the intended request
Any existing, non-OAuth query parameters desired in the request

member.summary: Creates a file parameter from an array of bytes.

member.name: P:RestSharp.RestRequest.AlwaysMultipartFormData
member.summary: Always send a multipart/form-data request - even when no Files are present.

member.name: P:RestSharp.RestRequest.Parameters
member.summary: Container of all HTTP parameters to be passed with the request. See AddParameter() for explanation of the types of parameters that can be passed

member.name: P:RestSharp.RestRequest.Files
member.summary: Container of all the files to be uploaded with the request.

member.name: P:RestSharp.RestRequest.Method
member.summary: Determines what HTTP method to use for this request. Supported methods: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, HEAD, OPTIONS Default is GET

member.name: P:RestSharp.RestRequest.Timeout
member.summary: Custom request timeout

member.name: P:RestSharp.RestRequest.Resource
member.summary: The Resource URL to make the request against. Tokens are substituted with UrlSegment parameters and match by name. Should not include the scheme or domain. Do not include leading slash. Combined with RestClient.BaseUrl to assemble final URL: {BaseUrl}/{Resource} (BaseUrl is scheme + domain, e.g. http://example.com)

member.name: P:RestSharp.RestRequest.RequestFormat
member.summary: Serializer to use when writing request bodies.

member.name: P:RestSharp.RestRequest.RootElement
member.summary: Used by the default deserializers to determine where to start deserializing from. Can be used to skip container or root elements that do not have corresponding deserialzation targets.

member.name: P:RestSharp.RestRequest.OnBeforeDeserialization
member.summary: When supplied, the function will be called before calling the deserializer

member.name: P:RestSharp.RestRequest.OnBeforeRequest
member.summary: When supplied, the function will be called before making a request

member.name: P:RestSharp.RestRequest.OnAfterRequest
member.summary: When supplied, the function will be called after the request is complete

member.name: P:RestSharp.RestRequest.Attempts
member.summary: How many attempts were made to send this Request
member.remarks: This number is incremented each time the RestClient sends the request.

member.name: P:RestSharp.RestRequest.CompletionOption
member.summary: Completion option for

member.name: P:RestSharp.RestRequest.ResponseWriter
member.summary: Set this to write response to Stream rather than reading into memory.

member.name: P:RestSharp.RestRequest.AdvancedResponseWriter
member.summary: Set this to handle the response stream yourself, based on the response details

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestRequestExtensions.AddUrlSegment(RestSharp.RestRequest,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds a URL segment parameter to the request. The resource URL must have a placeholder for the parameter for it to work. For example, if you add a URL segment parameter with the name "id", the resource URL should contain {id} in its path.
member.param: Name of the parameter, must be matching a placeholder in the resource URL as {name}
Encode the value or not, default true

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestRequestExtensions.AddUrlSegment``1(RestSharp.RestRequest,System.String,``0,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds a URL segment parameter to the request. The resource URL must have a placeholder for the parameter for it to work. For example, if you add a URL segment parameter with the name "id", the resource URL should contain {id} in its path.
member.param: Name of the parameter, must be matching a placeholder in the resource URL as {name}
Encode the value or not, default true

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestRequestExtensions.AddQueryParameter(RestSharp.RestRequest,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds a query string parameter to the request. The request resource should not contain any placeholders for this parameter. The parameter will be added to the request URL as a query string using name=value format.
member.param: Encode the value or not, default true

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestRequestExtensions.AddQueryParameter``1(RestSharp.RestRequest,System.String,``0,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds a query string parameter to the request. The request resource should not contain any placeholders for this parameter. The parameter will be added to the request URL as a query string using name=value format.
member.param: Encode the value or not, default true

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestRequestExtensions.AddHeader(RestSharp.RestRequest,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a header to the request. RestSharp will try to separate request and content headers when calling the resource.

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestRequestExtensions.AddHeader``1(RestSharp.RestRequest,System.String,``0)
member.summary: Adds a header to the request. RestSharp will try to separate request and content headers when calling the resource.

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestRequestExtensions.AddOrUpdateHeader(RestSharp.RestRequest,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds or updates the request header. RestSharp will try to separate request and content headers when calling the resource. Existing header with the same name will be replaced.

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestRequestExtensions.AddOrUpdateHeader``1(RestSharp.RestRequest,System.String,``0)
member.summary: Adds or updates the request header. RestSharp will try to separate request and content headers when calling the resource. Existing header with the same name will be replaced.

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestRequestExtensions.AddHeaders(RestSharp.RestRequest,System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.String,System.String}})
member.summary: Adds multiple headers to the request, using the key-value pairs provided.
member.param: Collection of key-value pairs, where key will be used as header name, and value as header value

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestRequestExtensions.AddOrUpdateHeaders(RestSharp.RestRequest,System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.String,System.String}})
member.summary: Adds or updates multiple headers to the request, using the key-value pairs provided. Existing headers with the same name will be replaced.
member.param: Collection of key-value pairs, where key will be used as header name, and value as header value

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestRequestExtensions.AddParameter(RestSharp.RestRequest,System.String,System.Object,RestSharp.ParameterType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds a parameter of a given type to the request. It will create a typed parameter instance based on the type argument. It is not recommended to use this overload unless you must, as it doesn't provide any restrictions, and if the name-value-type combination doesn't match, it will throw.
member.param: Name of the parameter, must be matching a placeholder in the resource URL as {name}
Enum value specifying what kind of parameter is being added
Encode the value or not, default true

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestRequestExtensions.AddOrUpdateParameter(RestSharp.RestRequest,System.String,System.Object,RestSharp.ParameterType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds or updates request parameter of a given type. It will create a typed parameter instance based on the type argument. Parameter will be added or updated based on its name. If the request has a parameter with the same name, it will be updated. It is not recommended to use this overload unless you must, as it doesn't provide any restrictions, and if the name-value-type combination doesn't match, it will throw.
member.param: Name of the parameter, must be matching a placeholder in the resource URL as {name}
Enum value specifying what kind of parameter is being added
Encode the value or not, default true

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestRequestExtensions.AddOrUpdateParameter(RestSharp.RestRequest,RestSharp.Parameter)
member.summary: Adds or updates request parameter, given the parameter instance, for example or . It will replace an existing parameter with the same name.

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestRequestExtensions.AddOrUpdateParameters(RestSharp.RestRequest,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{RestSharp.Parameter})
member.summary: Adds or updates multiple request parameters, given the parameter instance, for example or . Parameters with the same name will be replaced.

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestRequestExtensions.AddFile(RestSharp.RestRequest,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a file parameter to the request body. The file will be read from disk as a stream.

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestRequestExtensions.AddFile(RestSharp.RestRequest,System.String,System.Byte[],System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds bytes to the request as file attachment

member.summary: Adds a file attachment to the request, where the file content will be retrieved from a given stream
member.param: Function that returns a stream with the file content

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestRequestExtensions.AddBody(RestSharp.RestRequest,System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a body parameter to the request
member.param: Object to be used as the request body, or string for plain content
member.exception: Thrown if request body type cannot be resolved
member.remarks: This method will try to figure out the right content type based on the request data format and the provided content type

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestRequestExtensions.AddJsonBody``1(RestSharp.RestRequest,``0,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a JSON body parameter to the request
member.param: Object that will be serialized to JSON

member.summary: Adds an XML body parameter to the request
member.param: Object that will be serialized to XML

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestRequestExtensions.AddObject``1(RestSharp.RestRequest,``0,System.String[])
member.summary: Gets object properties and adds each property as a form data parameter

Properties to include, or nothing to include everything

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestClientExtensions.GetAsync``1(RestSharp.RestClient,RestSharp.RestRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Execute the request using GET HTTP method. Exception will be thrown if the request does not succeed. The response data is deserialized to the Data property of the returned response object.

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestClientExtensions.PostAsync``1(RestSharp.RestClient,RestSharp.RestRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Execute the request using POST HTTP method. Exception will be thrown if the request does not succeed. The response data is deserialized to the Data property of the returned response object.

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestClientExtensions.PutAsync``1(RestSharp.RestClient,RestSharp.RestRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Execute the request using PUT HTTP method. Exception will be thrown if the request does not succeed. The response data is deserialized to the Data property of the returned response object.

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestClientExtensions.HeadAsync``1(RestSharp.RestClient,RestSharp.RestRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Execute the request using HEAD HTTP method. Exception will be thrown if the request does not succeed. The response data is deserialized to the Data property of the returned response object.

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestClientExtensions.OptionsAsync``1(RestSharp.RestClient,RestSharp.RestRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Execute the request using OPTIONS HTTP method. Exception will be thrown if the request does not succeed. The response data is deserialized to the Data property of the returned response object.

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestClientExtensions.PatchAsync``1(RestSharp.RestClient,RestSharp.RestRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Execute the request using PATCH HTTP method. Exception will be thrown if the request does not succeed. The response data is deserialized to the Data property of the returned response object.

member.summary: Execute the request using DELETE HTTP method. Exception will be thrown if the request does not succeed. The response data is deserialized to the Data property of the returned response object.

member.summary: Sets the to only use JSON

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestClientExtensions.GetJsonAsync``1(RestSharp.RestClient,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Calls the URL specified in the resource parameter, expecting a JSON response back. Deserializes and returns the response.

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestClientExtensions.PostJsonAsync``2(RestSharp.RestClient,System.String,``0,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Serializes the request object to JSON and makes a POST call to the resource specified in the resource parameter. Expects a JSON response back, deserializes it to TResponse type and returns it.
member.param: Request object, must be serializable to JSON

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestClientExtensions.PostJsonAsync``1(RestSharp.RestClient,System.String,``0,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Serializes the request object to JSON and makes a POST call to the resource specified in the resource parameter. Expects no response back, just the status code.
member.param: Request object, must be serializable to JSON

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestClientExtensions.PutJsonAsync``2(RestSharp.RestClient,System.String,``0,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Serializes the request object to JSON and makes a PUT call to the resource specified in the resource parameter. Expects a JSON response back, deserializes it to TResponse type and returns it.
member.param: Request object, must be serializable to JSON

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestClientExtensions.PutJsonAsync``1(RestSharp.RestClient,System.String,``0,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Serializes the request object to JSON and makes a PUT call to the resource specified in the resource parameter. Expects no response back, just the status code.
member.param: Request object, must be serializable to JSON

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestClientExtensions.AddDefaultParameter(RestSharp.RestClient,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a default HTTP parameter (QueryString for GET, DELETE, OPTIONS and HEAD; Encoded form for POST and PUT) Used on every request made by this client instance

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestClientExtensions.AddDefaultParameter(RestSharp.RestClient,System.String,System.Object,RestSharp.ParameterType)
member.summary: Adds a default parameter to the client options. There are four types of parameters: - GetOrPost: Either a QueryString value or encoded form value based on method - HttpHeader: Adds the name/value pair to the HTTP request's Headers collection - UrlSegment: Inserted into URL if there is a matching url token e.g. {AccountId} - RequestBody: Used by AddBody() (not recommended to use directly) Used on every request made by this client instance
member.param: The type of parameter to add

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestClientExtensions.AddDefaultHeader(RestSharp.RestClient,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a default header to the RestClient. Used on every request made by this client instance.
member.param: Name of the header to add
Value of the header to add

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestClientExtensions.AddDefaultHeaders(RestSharp.RestClient,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Adds default headers to the RestClient. Used on every request made by this client instance.
member.param: Dictionary containing the Names and Values of the headers to add

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestClientExtensions.AddDefaultUrlSegment(RestSharp.RestClient,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a default URL segment parameter to the RestClient. Used on every request made by this client instance.
member.param: Name of the segment to add
Value of the segment to add

member.name: M:RestSharp.RestClientExtensions.AddDefaultQueryParameter(RestSharp.RestClient,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a default URL query parameter to the RestClient. Used on every request made by this client instance.
member.param: Name of the query parameter to add
Value of the query parameter to add

member.name: P:RestSharp.RestClientOptions.BaseUrl
member.summary: Explicit Host header value to use in requests independent from the request URI. If null, default host value extracted from URI is used.

member.name: P:RestSharp.RestClientOptions.Credentials
member.summary: In general you would not need to set this directly. Used by the NtlmAuthenticator.

member.name: P:RestSharp.RestClientOptions.UseDefaultCredentials
member.summary: Determine whether or not the "default credentials" (e.g. the user account under which the current process is running) will be sent along to the server. The default is false.

member.name: P:RestSharp.RestClientOptions.DisableCharset
member.summary: Set to true if you need the Content-Type not to have the charset

member.name: P:RestSharp.RestClientOptions.ClientCertificates
member.summary: X509CertificateCollection to be sent with request

member.name: P:RestSharp.RestClientOptions.PreAuthenticate
member.summary: Flag to send authorisation header with the HttpWebRequest

member.name: P:RestSharp.RestClientOptions.ThrowOnDeserializationError
member.summary: Modifies the default behavior of RestSharp to swallow exceptions. When set to true, a will be thrown in case RestSharp fails to deserialize the response.

member.name: P:RestSharp.RestClientOptions.FailOnDeserializationError
member.summary: Modifies the default behavior of RestSharp to swallow exceptions. When set to true, RestSharp will consider the request as unsuccessful in case it fails to deserialize the response.

member.name: P:RestSharp.RestClientOptions.ThrowOnAnyError
member.summary: Modifies the default behavior of RestSharp to swallow exceptions. When set to true, exceptions will be re-thrown.

member.name: P:RestSharp.RestClientOptions.RemoteCertificateValidationCallback
member.summary: Callback function for handling the validation of remote certificates. Useful for certificate pinning and overriding certificate errors in the scope of a request.

member.name: P:RestSharp.RestClientOptions.AllowMultipleDefaultParametersWithSameName
member.summary: By default, RestSharp doesn't allow multiple parameters to have the same name. This properly allows to override the default behavior.

member.name: M:RestSharp.Serializers.Json.RestClientExtensions.UseSystemTextJson(RestSharp.RestClient)
member.summary: Use System.Text.Json serializer with default settings

member.summary: Use System.Text.Json serializer with custom settings

member.summary: Create the new serializer that uses System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer with custom settings
